name: Big Man Bag 1
description:
This extra large, one-of-a-kind cross body bag was made to last a life time. The thick waxy leather is durable enough to hold up to all your adventures & will continuously be changing & getting better with time & use. The natural flap on the front will both protect your goods inside & also lend your bag it's unique, understated signature style that is all yours. The roomy, extra spacious inside has 2 additional pockets to store your phone or keys. The shoulder strap is made up of one of my favorite vintage belts combined with a very old leather support from a horse harness. This bag is meant to belong to just the right person who is willing to break it in & love it for a long time to come.

19"w x 14"h x 3"deep
front flap drop: 11"
inside pockets: 5"w x 6.5"h
adjustable strap: 35"l x 1.5"w / shoulder support 2.5"w x 12"l

Local pick-up option:
If you are in the neighborhood (Boulder vicinity) and would like to save yourself a couple bucks on shipping you can pick up your goods at Elke's studio in downtown Boulder! 
Please make sure you select the "pick-up" option in shipping choices on PayPal.

name: Vintage Boyscout 1
description:
One-of-a-kind

This rare, khaki canvas vintage boy scout pack had many adventures with a little boy back in the 1940's or 50's. 
  The ties have been replaced with bright orange paracord & have been added on the expandable sides to keep the bag smaller when necessary. The front flap was reconstructed after the original leather straps crumbled to bits & left gaping holes where they were attached. The flap is actually a roomy additional pocket that can be opened with the same authentic buckle hardware. A hand cut & finished shoulder strap has been added for easy carrying & is attached to the bag by 2 solid brass bolt snaps. When the shoulder strap is removed it can be used for your own camping adventure. The front flap & back straps have been reinforced with a mocha vegetable tanned leather for added durability.

size: 12 1/2"W x 18 1/2"H x 6" deep
removable shoulder strap: 33"L x 1/2"W (shoulder reinforcement is 1.25"w)

Local pick-up option:
If you are in the neighborhood (Boulder vicinity) and would like to save yourself a couple bucks on shipping you can pick up your goods at Elke's studio in downtown Boulder! 
Please make sure you select the "pick-up" option in shipping choices on PayPal.

name: Ultimate Gym Bag
description:
This vintage European ruck-sack has been converted to a cross body bag/urban messenger.  This durable bag would be  great for hitting the road or hitting the gym. With its roomy interior and front compartments this bag is perfect for carrying books, folders, laptops, and sweaty socks. This heavy weight cotton canvas bag has original vintage ruck-sack details.

Dimensions:
15" w x 14"h x 6" deep
2 front pockets with bellows measure 7" w x 9.5" h
removable strap measures 36" x 3/4"
4 of a kind

If you are in the neighborhood (Boulder vicinity) and would like to save yourself a couple bucks on shipping you can pick up your goods at Elke's studio in downtown Boulder!

name: Mocha Morgan Tote
description:
This one-of-a-kind  tote bag is made from a very thick, soft, natural Mocha veg tan leather.  The leather has been burnished & finished to make it look a little older than just off the cutting table. The oversized front patch pocket is reminiscent of a saddle bag and has a hand punched cross design embroidered with black waxed thread.. It is large enough to toss your phone and keys, and anything else you may need for a quick getaway.  There is also a roomy inside patch pocket.  The straps are black, hand-cut & finished horse bridal leather with brass hardware. 

size: 16"h x 14"w x 5"d
shoulder straps: 20"L x 1/2" w, 10" drop
front curved patch pockets: 9.5" L x 10" w
inside pocket: 5.5"w x 7" h

*Custom Order Available- Please note: The body and the color of your custom bag  will be consistent with the one in the photo. However strap color and application may vary slightly. Therefore each bag truly is one of a kind!  Please allow 2-3 weeks for production.

Local pick-up option:
If you are in the neighborhood (Boulder vicinity) and would like to save yourself a couple bucks on shipping you can pick up your goods at Elke's studio in downtown Boulder! 
Please make sure you select the "pick-up" option in shipping choices on PayPal.

name: Red Carson Tote
description:
This design started out when we found a really fantastic vintage red canvas log carrier. By adding the leather bottom & side zippers to the existing shape it turned into an amazing oversized tote bag.Well, that original bag left my studio quite some time ago but I did have the foresight to copy the shape & make a pattern. This is the result. I love this bag not only for it's bigness (I keep picturing myself going through an airport with it) but also for it's unique shape & it's very convenient 2 zipper side opening. In a pinch, you can even reach into the inside pocket without opening the bag at all. The outside pocket is a great spot to store your phone or your plane tickets. The leather straps that wrap around the body (which by the way is one gigantic piece of leather. No cutlines here!) & the shoulder straps are all hand cut & finished. Inside the bag is a classic cotton canvas ticking that will add durability to an already very strong tote. A small white cross has been hand punched & embroidered to add the signature touch.

17.5"w x 19.5"h x 5"deep
front pocket: 6.5" x 9.5"
shoulder straps: 5/8"w x 23"l, 10" drop
2 inside pockets: 4.5"w x 6"d

*Custom Order Available- Please note: The body and the color of your custom bag  will be consistent with the one in the photo. However strap color and application may vary slightly. Therefore each bag truly is one of a kind!  Please allow 2-3 weeks for production.

Local pick-up option:
If you are in the neighborhood (Boulder vicinity) and would like to save yourself a couple bucks on shipping you can pick up your goods at Elke's studio in downtown Boulder! 
Please make sure you select the "pick-up" option in shipping choices on PayPal.

name: 12" Chocolate Jackson Clutch
description:
The Jackson clutch is made from a really thick but soft vegetable tanned leather. After the body is sewn the bag is subjected to at least 4 different steps of finishing to achieve that already broken in & burnished look that only comes after loving a leather bag for a very long time. This style is both casual but elegant & is big enough to hold all your important essentials when going out. The closures may be a little different depending on what special leather pieces I have on hand. My favorite part of putting the clutch together is matching up the perfect leather strapping after I see the finished product of the bag. Each one is unique & no two will ever look the same. 

This bag can be ordered & finished especially for you. Please allow 2 weeks for delivery. 

12"w x 9.5"h (when open)
12"w x 6"h (when closed)
2" deep
inside pocket: 6" x 4"

Local pick-up option:
If you are in the neighborhood (Boulder vicinity) and would like to save yourself a couple bucks on shipping you can pick up your goods at Elke's studio in downtown Boulder! 
Please make sure you select the "pick-up" option in shipping choices on PayPal.

name: Chocolate Custer Cross Body
description:
The Custer cross body bag is truly one of my favorite shapes. We fell in love with that curve while cutting the pockets for the Morgan tote. There is much more behind this simple bag than meets the eye. Starting with a beautiful thick vegetable tanned leather, the bag is sewn together and is subjected to at least 4 different steps of finishing to achieve that already broken in & burnished look that only comes after loving a leather bag for a very long time. The slim silhouette & clean lines gives this bag a timeless look. A nice long, handmade leather tassel is attached to the zipper to add a little extra subtle style. The roomy front pocket is a great place to stash your phone & the equally large inside pocket can be used for your essentials that you don't want to loose at the bottom of your bag. The strap on this bag is a repurposed horse bridle with a fabulous patina. It can be adjusted slightly for length.

This bag can be ordered & finished especially for you. Please allow 2 weeks for delivery. 

10"w x 13.5"h
Pockets: 6.25"w x 8"h
strap: 43"L x 3/8"w (20" drop)

Local pick-up option:
If you are in the neighborhood (Boulder vicinity) and would like to save yourself a couple bucks on shipping you can pick up your goods at Elke's studio in downtown Boulder! 
Please make sure you select the "pick-up" option in shipping choices on PayPal.

name: Chocolate Custer Clutch
description:
The Custer clutch echoes the curved lines of the Custer cross body. This smaller, portable version is an easy alternative to carrying a large bag when you go out. There is much more behind this simple bag than meets the eye. Starting with a beautiful thick vegetable tanned leather, the bag is sewn together and is subjected to at least 4 different steps of finishing to achieve that already broken in & burnished look that only comes after loving a leather bag for a very long time. A handmade tassel is added to the brass zipper pull for a little extra style. This bag will only look more fabulous the more you handle & use it. The leather was meant to be loved.

This bag can be ordered & finished especially for you. Please allow 2 weeks for delivery.

name: Stanford Drawstring Tote
description:
This roomy, one-of-a-kind bag can fit all of your things in style. The mocha leather  is vegetable tanned. This natural finishing process allows the leather to have a more natural, naked feel. The leather is hand cut and front detail includes a hand punched-hand stiched red cross. Two dark brown straps will fit nicely over your shoulders as you move  from meetings, to lunch, to school pick-up. The bag is lined in blue and white cotton ticking and has a unique drawstring opening.Two roomy front pockets are perfect for stashing your keys and your phone. Roomy inside pockets a great for keeping your important things safe.

13.5"w x 12" h x 7"deep

name: Mocha 2 Pocket Peek-A-Boo Tote
description:
Well, it was time to try something a little different. This roomy tote, at first glance, is very simple & classic. It's not until you open the pockets of this very soft, thick, mocha colored vegetable tanned leather that you see the surprise red peeking out at you. The pocket is backed in a fabulous mandarin red leather that when opened,gives the bag just a pop of color & a lot of interest. The inside patch pocket is also the beautiful red color.   The dark brown straps have been hand cut & finished out of sturdy bridle leather & fit comfortable on your shoulder.

17"w x 15.5"h
front & inside pocket: 6.25"w x 8"h
straps: 23"l x 1/2"w (10" drop)

*Custom Order Available- Please note: The body and the color of your custom bag  will be consistent with the one in the photo but each bag is made one at a time so there will be slight differences. Each bag truly is one of a kind!  Please allow 2-3 weeks for production.

name: Mocha Peek-A-Boo Tote
description:
Well, it was time to try something a little different. This roomy tote, at first glance, is very simple & classic. It's not until you open the pocket of this very soft, thick, mocha colored vegetable tanned leather that you see the surprise red peeking out at you. The pocket is backed in a fabulous mandarin red leather that when opened,gives the bag just a pop of color & a lot of interest. The inside patch pocket is also the beautiful red color along with the handmade, removable extra long tassel. A leather tab has been added to the inside so you can partially secure your bag closed & it also gives the bag a more shaped silhouette. The dark brown straps have been hand cut & finished out of sturdy bridle leather & fit comfortable on your shoulder.

name: Vintage Boyscout 2
description:
One-of-a-kind

This rare, khaki canvas vintage boy scout pack had many adventures with a little boy back in the 1940's or 50's. 
  The ties have been replaced with bright orange paracord & have been added on the expandable sides to keep the bag smaller when necessary.  A hand cut & finished shoulder strap has been added for easy carrying & is attached to the bag by 2 solid brass bolt snaps. When the shoulder strap is removed it can be used for your own camping adventure.The back straps have been reinforced with a mocha vegetable tanned leather for added durability. There is an open pouch pocket under the front flap for easy access.

name: Carson Striped Tote
description:
This design started out when we found a really fantastic vintage red canvas log carrier. By adding the leather bottom & side zippers to the existing shape it turned into an amazing oversized tote bag.Well, that original bag left my studio quite some time ago but I did have the foresight to copy the shape & make a pattern. This is the result. I love this bag not only for it's bigness (I keep picturing myself going through an airport with it) but also for it's unique shape & it's very convenient 2 zipper side opening. In a pinch, you can even reach into the inside pocket without opening the bag at all. The outside pocket is a great spot to store your phone or your plane tickets. the leather piecing that wraps around the body & the shoulder straps are all hand cut & finished. The bottom is reinforced with a soft, thick vegetable tanned chocolate colored leather. A small red cross has been hand punched & embroidered below the front strap. Inside the bag is a classic natural canvas that will add durability to an already very strong tote.

name: Montrose Cross-Body

name: Medfield Cross Body 2
description:
This vintage Swiss military bag has been repurposed into a very hip modern cross body bag. The leather was cleaned & revived & rare antique WWII leather suspenders have been repurposed into an adjustable shoulder strap. The bag is made out of a heavy waxed cotton faille fabric with a unique leather tab closure across a beautiful "Y" strap brace. There are no interior pockets. Each bag is branded with the date it was issued on the front lower strap. I encourage you to look at the available pictures of all 3 bags listed to get a good idea of all the details involved in these bags. The 3 bags are basically the same from the 1960's but have different shoulder straps. 

Size: 11"w x 8"h x 4" deep
strap: 47-54"L x 1"w

name: Logan Clutch
description:
This canvas & leather clutch was repurposed from a vintage army tarp. The bottom is reinforced in a soft, dark brown leather & the canvas has been painted with a crisp white stripe down the center. The brass zipper is a contrast white color & there are vintage fishing lures added to the pull. The inside has been clean finished with red piping.
